fieldUpdates.description: CRM-376 : Permet de cocher la case lors de l'envoi d'un email au parrain
fieldUpdates.name: Mise a jour notification par

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(AND(!ISBLANK(BillingPostalCode), OR(ISBLANK(BillingCountry), UPPER(BillingCountry) == 'F', UPPER(BillingCountry) == 'FR', UPPER(BillingCountry) == 'FRA')), 'FRANCE', UPPER(BillingCountry))
fieldUpdates.name: UR001_K2_Account_Country_B2B

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(AND(!ISBLANK(PersonMailingPostalCode), OR(ISBLANK(PersonMailingCountry), UPPER(PersonMailingCountry) == 'F', UPPER(PersonMailingCountry) == 'FR', UPPER(PersonMailingCountry) == 'FRA')), 'FRANCE', UPPER(PersonMailingCountry))
fieldUpdates.name: UR001_K2_Account_Country_B2C

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(OR($Profile.Name = 'K/K - DC', $Profile.Name = 'K/K - TA', $Profile.Name = 'K/K - TA/Entrant', $Profile.Name = 'K/K - TA/Sortant', $Profile.Name = 'K/K - Superviseur', $Profile.Name = 'K/K - Assistante Call', $UserRole.Name = 'Directeur Call', $UserRole.Name = 'Superviseur', $UserRole.Name = 'TA'), LastModifiedDate, lastModifiedDateByCall__c)
fieldUpdates.name: UR001_K2_Account_LastModifiedDateByCall

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(OR(CONTAINS('K/K - DR,K/K - DV,K/K - En charge de magasin,K/K - Foire,K/K - Formateur,K/K - RV,K/K - RVJ,K/K - Vendeur', $Profile.Name), $Profile.Name = 'K/K - TP', $UserRole.Name = 'Foire', $UserRole.Name = 'Formateur'), LastModifiedDate, lastModifiedDateBySale__c)
fieldUpdates.name: UR001_K2_Account_LastModifiedDateBySale

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(OR($Profile.Name = 'K/K - DC', $Profile.Name = 'K/K - TA', $Profile.Name = 'K/K - TA/Entrant', $Profile.Name = 'K/K - TA/Sortant', $Profile.Name = 'K/K - Superviseur', $Profile.Name = 'K/K - Assistante Call', $UserRole.Name = 'Directeur Call', $UserRole.Name = 'Superviseur', $UserRole.Name = 'TA'), NULLVALUE(nbModificationsByCall__c, 0) + 1, nbModificationsByCall__c)
fieldUpdates.name: UR001_K2_Account_NbModificationsByCall

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(OR(CONTAINS('K/K - DR,K/K - DV,K/K - En charge de magasin,K/K - Foire,K/K - Formateur,K/K - RV,K/K - RVJ,K/K - Vendeur', $Profile.Name), $Profile.Name = 'K/K - TP', $UserRole.Name = 'Foire', $UserRole.Name = 'Formateur'), NULLVALUE(nbModificationsBySale__c, 0) + 1, nbModificationsBySale__c)
fieldUpdates.name: UR001_K2_Account_NbModificationsBySale

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(AND(ISCHANGED(BillingPostalCode), OR(UPPER(BillingCountry) == 'F', UPPER(BillingCountry) == 'FR', UPPER(BillingCountry) == 'FRA', UPPER(BillingCountry) == 'FRANCE')), LPAD(BillingPostalCode, 5, '0'), UPPER(BillingPostalCode))
fieldUpdates.name: UR001_K2_Account_PostalCode_B2B

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(AND(ISCHANGED(PersonMailingPostalCode), OR(UPPER(PersonMailingCountry) == 'F', UPPER(PersonMailingCountry) == 'FR', UPPER(PersonMailingCountry) == 'FRA', UPPER(PersonMailingCountry) == 'FRANCE')), LPAD(PersonMailingPostalCode, 5, '0'), UPPER(PersonMailingPostalCode))
fieldUpdates.name: UR001_K2_Account_PostalCode_B2C

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISNULL(sectorisation__c)), OR(ISBLANK(libelleDSReference__c), ISCHANGED(iris__c))), sectorisation__r.codeDS__c, codeDSReference__c )
fieldUpdates.name: UR001_K2_Account_SectRef_CodeDS

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISNULL(sectorisation__c)), OR(ISBLANK(libelleDVReference__c), ISCHANGED(iris__c))), sectorisation__r.codeDV__c, codeDVReference__c )
fieldUpdates.name: UR001_K2_Account_SectRef_CodeDV

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISNULL(sectorisation__c)), OR(ISBLANK(libelleDepotReference__c), ISCHANGED(iris__c))), sectorisation__r.codeDepot__c, codeDepotReference__c )
fieldUpdates.name: UR001_K2_Account_SectRef_CodeDepot

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISNULL(sectorisation__c)), OR(ISBLANK(libelleMagasinReference__c), ISCHANGED(iris__c))), sectorisation__r.codeMagasin__c, codeMagasinReference__c )
fieldUpdates.name: UR001_K2_Account_SectRef_CodeMagasin

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISNULL(sectorisation__c)), OR(ISBLANK(libelleRegionReference__c), ISCHANGED(iris__c))), sectorisation__r.codeRegion__c, codeRegionReference__c )
fieldUpdates.name: UR001_K2_Account_SectRef_CodeRegion

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISNULL(sectorisation__c)), OR(ISBLANK(libelleDSReference__c), ISCHANGED(iris__c))), sectorisation__r.libelleDS__c, libelleDSReference__c )
fieldUpdates.name: UR001_K2_Account_SectRef_LibDS

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISNULL(sectorisation__c)), OR(ISBLANK(libelleDVReference__c), ISCHANGED(iris__c))), sectorisation__r.libelleDV__c, libelleDVReference__c )
fieldUpdates.name: UR001_K2_Account_SectRef_LibDV

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISNULL(sectorisation__c)), OR(ISBLANK(libelleDepotReference__c), ISCHANGED(iris__c))), sectorisation__r.libelleDepot__c, libelleDepotReference__c )
fieldUpdates.name: UR001_K2_Account_SectRef_LibDepot

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISNULL(sectorisation__c)), OR(ISBLANK(libelleMagasinReference__c), ISCHANGED(iris__c))), sectorisation__r.libelleMagasin__c, libelleMagasinReference__c )
fieldUpdates.name: UR001_K2_Account_SectRef_LibMagasin

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISNULL(sectorisation__c)), OR(ISBLANK(libelleRegionReference__c), ISCHANGED(iris__c))), sectorisation__r.libelleRegion__c, libelleRegionReference__c )
fieldUpdates.name: UR001_K2_Account_SectRef_LibRegion

fieldUpdates.description: Copie la valeur de la formule codeMagasinActuel__c dans codeMagasinTechnique__c
fieldUpdates.name: UR001_K2_Compte_CodeMagasinTechnique

rules.formula: AND(NOT($User.ByPassWorkflowRule__c), OR(owner__r.Profile.Name = 'K/K - DC', owner__r.Profile.Name = 'K/K - TA', owner__r.Profile.Name = 'K/K - TA/Entrant', owner__r.Profile.Name = 'K/K - TA/Sortant', owner__r.Profile.Name = 'K/K - Superviseur', owner__r.Profile.Name = 'K/K - Assistante Call', owner__r.UserRole.Name = 'Directeur Call', owner__r.UserRole.Name = 'Superviseur', owner__r.UserRole.Name = 'TA'))

AND(NOT($User.ByPassWorkflowRule__c), OR(CONTAINS('K/K - DR,K/K - DV,K/K - En charge de magasin,K/K - Foire,K/K - Formateur,K/K - RV,K/K - RVJ,K/K - Vendeur', owner__r.Profile.Name), owner__r.Profile.Name = 'K/K - TP', owner__r.UserRole.Name = 'Foire', owner__r.UserRole.Name = 'Formateur'))

rules.description: CRM-376 : Envoi d'un email au parrain lorsqu'un filleul est créé avec le type : "Client"
rules.formula: $User.ByPassWorkflowRule__c == false && ISPICKVAL(Type ,"Client") && parrain__c != null && notificationEmailParrain__c == false

rules.description: Mise à jour date de parrainage lorsque associé à un parrain
CRM-376 : Envoi d'un email au parrain lorsqu'un filleul est créé avec le type : "Piste"
